comment: Add missing extension to the repo connection string.
Update readme to include info on how to include in your project.
Internalize FakeR into AnimatorInflater and use actual constants from the platform R class.
Fix imports on event sample. Use text color rather than alpha so it works on all devices.
Move api demos into their own package. Add droid flakes demo.
Fix stupid ADT renaming crap incorrectly.
Abstract GPU part of droid flakes sample to be honeycomb+ only.
Remove unused imports from a refactor.
Update dependencies to link against maven central artifacts.
Enable properties. The internal variety, however.
Add `Nine`-prefixed view and widget classes which enable the animation of alpha, translation, scale, and rotation on pre-API11 devices.
Enable wrapper-less animation of post-3.0 properties on pre-3.0.
Fix checkstyle problems with new path sample.
Update change log for the new hotness.
Optimize proxy transformation and fix x/y rotation.
Lazily create proxy properties to ensure we know the target type.
Transformation fixes because I'm an idiot.
Bump version to 2.0.1 and update change log.
Not that this will ever change...
Forward listener events with a null animation for now.
Add Chet Haase's VPA demo. This shows some shortcomings in our implementation...
Use a weak map to associate a single animator to a view.
Try a weak hash map with the post-3.0 compat impl too.
Translate back and forth in toggles.
Static import trickery for cleaner look that is closer to original impl.
Try put the caching in AnimatorProxy itself so that the end-users are afforded it as well.
Point to the newest version in README.
Provide Honeycomb-specific compat impl of ViewPropertyAnimator.
Forgot to make these package-scoped. Hopefully no-one notices...
Fixed bug where scaleX is tested twice instead of scaleX || scaleY
Added proper shielding against unneeded updates on setAlpha(). Added proper test for mHasPivot in case setting pivotX or pivotY to 0 (wouldn't have triggered an update in this case)
Scale testing is more useful when testing against 1.0, not 0.0
Style tweaks to appease the checkstyle plugin.
Hold target view in a weak reference.
Prepare change log for next version.
bugfix : AnimatorProxy setScrollY was updating scrollX with Y value
Fixes memory leaks in ViewPropertyAnimator implementations. Hard references and listeners were causing the leak to happen.
Removed method used for debugging purpouses
Fix for AnimatorProxy's cache mechanism; before reusing a proxy checks whether it still is the animation of the given view.
Use TypedValue load to avoid private attribute ID conflict.
Fix property ordering so attribute values are ascending.
Only use getDeclaredMethod as a fallback, since it doesn't find superclass methods.
Properly honor pivot for scale operation.
Do not invalidate parent if view is not attached to anything.
Complete helper class for delegating to native when available.
Clean up pivot math for scaling.
Bump version to 2.4.0. Update manifest a bit.
Ensure ViewHelper has all methods. Consolidate helpers into single class.
